mapper.select: select ca_no , user_no , ca_title , ca_memo , ca_startdate , ca_enddate , ca_color , ca_category , com_no from calendar join users using (user_no) where ca_category = '전사' and com_no = 1

select ca_no , user_no , ca_title , ca_memo , ca_startdate , ca_enddate , ca_color , ca_category , dept_no from calendar join users using (user_no) where ca_category = '부서' and dept_no = #{deptNo} and com_no = #{comNo}

select APVL_WRITER||'dayoff' as "CA_NO" , concat(off_start_date, ' 09:00') as "CA_STARTDATE" , concat(off_end_date, ' 18:00') as "CA_ENDDATE" , off_reason as "CA_MEMO" , concat(user_name, substr(APVL_FORM_NAME, 1, 2)) as "CA_TITLE" from users join approval on (user_no = apvl_writer) join approval_dayoff using (apvl_no) join approval_form using (APVL_FORM_NO) where dept_no = #{deptNo} and apvl_status = 'C'

select ca_no , user_no , ca_title , ca_memo , ca_startdate , ca_enddate , ca_color , ca_category , com_no from calendar join users using (user_no) where ca_category = '개인' and com_no = #{comNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
